question: Which ministry signed an MoU with Uttar Pradesh for management of Home of Widows at Sunrakh Bangar, Vrindavan?
option1: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
option2: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
option3: Ministry of Women and Child and Development
answer: Ministry of Women and Child and Development
explanation: The Ministry of Women and Child and Development, Government of India has signed an MoU with Department of Women and Child Development, Government of Uttar Pradesh, in New Delhi for management of Home of Widows at Sunrakh Bangar, Vrindavan. The MoU shall be in force for a period of 2 years which may be renewed for further period on the satisfactory running of the Home.
